document_data.name: Giragonne
document_data.skincolor: Yellow with coppery spots, copper-colored wings
document_data.mainbody: '''Giragonnes''' were magical hybrids of [[giraffe]]s and [[copper dragon]]s. These creatures were natural comedians, and were always looking for an audience.
document_data.Description: Giragonnes combined traits of their component creatures, featuring the long neck and spindly legs of a giraffe, and the draconic head and wings of a copper dragon. Although it stood {{SI|16|ft|long=yes}} tall, its torso was not much larger than that of a draft [[horse]].
document_data.Combat: Giragonnes rarely engaged in combat, preferring to defuse a situation or incapacitate assailants using their natural ability to cast ''[[Otto's irresistible dance]]'', ''[[grease]]'', ''[[Tasha's hideous laughter]]'', and ''[[baleful transposition]]'', as well as their adhesive, thick spittle. If forced into a fight, giragonnes were able to deliver a powerful kick with their hind legs.
document_data.Society:
Although giragonnes were sociable with other species, they generally didn't seek out the companionship of their kin.

Giragonne lairs were filled with objects the creatures deemed comedic, including [[book]]s and [[scroll]]s filled with jokes.

Giragonnes laired mostly in the Shaar and Aunorach, though they lived throughout desert and savannah areas.
document_data.Rumors & Legends: Legend had it that these creatures were created by a humorous wizard with a passion for crossbreeding magical creatures.
